about_the_game:
Strap in, press the gas, and keep your precious cargo intact! Egg Racing is a fast-paced driving game that dares you to speed through whimsical tracks—without cracking the fragile egg perched in your car. Developed by Isomuna, whose name “Iso Muna” (Finnish for “big egg”) reflects both our humble beginnings and grand ambitions, Egg Racing combines the thrill of high-octane motorsport with the delicate touch of a balancing act.

Key Features

  • Egg-cellent Challenge – Race against the clock while carefully protecting your egg. One wrong move, and it’s game over!

  • Cartoony Chaos – Dive into vibrant, cartoony graphics that match the fun, playful nature of each track.

  • Multiple Tracks – Master an array of challenging courses, each designed to test your reflexes, speed, and precision driving skills.

  • Rewarding Gameplay – Every second counts in these swift, exhilarating races. Hone your technique to climb the leaderboards and earn your bragging rights.

  • Born from Finland’s Natural Beauty – Our small team has been inspired by Finland’s landscape, so expect a touch of nature’s charm to shine through in every turn.

Rev up your engine, hold on to your egg, and see if you can beat the odds—or end up with egg on your face!

name: Egg Racing
short_description: Race against time and keep your fragile egg safe in Egg Racing! Speed through cartoony tracks, master challenging turns, and prove your precision driving skills. One misstep and your egg goes splat—can you handle the pressure without cracking?
